service.short: Dash Core Full Node or Masternode - Testnet
service.description:
Dash (Digital Cash) is an open source peer-to-peer cryptocurrency that offers instant transactions (InstantSend), private transactions (PrivateSend) and token fungibility.
A Dash Full Node is a un-collatoralized member of a decentralized network of servers that validate transactions and blocks. A Dash Masternode is a member of a network of incentivized servers that perform expanded critical services for the Dash cryptocurrency protocol.
"Testnet" refers to a node that operates within the testnet (versus mainnet) network and is used to test experimental features and functionality with test currency (tDash).
